about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for web development. I have experience in building web applications using modern technologies. I am a quick learner and I am always looking for new challenges.

exco.name: Exco FSE
exco.description: Developing and maintaining web applications for clients. This involves working closely with clients to understand their requirements and translating them into functional and visually appealing web applications.    Responsibilities include both front-end and back-end development, ensuring seamless integration between the two. On the front-end, tasks include designing user interfaces, implementing responsive design, and optimizing user experience.    On the back-end, tasks include setting up databases, creating APIs, and ensuring data security and integrity. Additionally, the role involves debugging and troubleshooting issues, performing regular updates and maintenance,    and staying up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies to continuously improve the applications.
exco.shortDescription: Developed and maintained web applications for clients. Worked on the front-end and back-end of the applications.
